1115.question: What were the sizes of the test sets?

3-Table1-1.png: The sizes of the test sets were 100, 200, and 300.</s>
The sizes of the test sets were 100 for NLM-90, 200 for Training 22, 100 for Test Set 1, and 200 for Test Set 2.</s>

1115.answer: Test set 1 contained 57 drug labels and 8208 sentences and test set 2 contained 66 drug labels and 4224 sentences
